member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location
member.summary: Represents a geographic location information.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Latitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the latitude, in degrees. Latitude can range from -90.0 to 90.0. Latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator. Positive values are north of the equator and negative values are south of the equator.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Longitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the longitude, in degrees. The longitude can range from -180.0 to 180.0. Longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the prime meridian. Negative values are west of the prime meridian, and positive values are east of the prime meridian.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Altitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the altitude, in meters.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Course
member.summary: Gets or sets the course, in degrees. The course can range from 0 to 360.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Speed
member.summary: Gets or sets the speed, in meters per second.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Accuracy
member.summary: Gets or sets the location accuracy, in meters.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Contents.Location.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the location description text.

member.summary: Base64 representation of the account password. Mandatory in case of updating account password.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact
member.summary: Represents a contact information.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.Identity
member.summary: The identity of the contact, in the name@domain format.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.Name
member.summary: The name of the contact. This information is only visible by the roster owner.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.IsPending
member.summary: Determines if the contact is pending for acceptance by the roster owner. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.SharePresence
member.summary: Indicates if the roster owner wants to share presence information with the contact. If true, the server provides a get delegation permission to the contact identity into the roster owner presence resource. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.ShareAccountInfo
member.summary: Indicates if the roster owner wants to share account information with the contact. If true, the server provides a get delegation permission to the contact identity into the roster owner account resource. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.Priority
member.summary: Indicates the contact priority.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.ToString
member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Contact.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A hash code for this instance, suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation
member.summary: Represents a delegation to send envelopes on behalf of another node. The delegation can be constrained to specific envelope types and specific details.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.Target
member.summary: Gets or sets the target node which will receive the delegation.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.EnvelopeTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the envelope types for delegation. If none is specified, indicates that all envelope types should be delegated.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.Messages
member.summary: Message constraints for delegation. If not present, the delegation is given without any restriction for the envelope type.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.Notifications
member.summary: Notification constraints for delegation. If not present, the delegation is given without any restriction for the envelope type.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Delegation.Commands
member.summary: Command constraints for delegation. If not present, the delegation is given without any restriction for the envelope type.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationMessage
member.summary: Represents delegation constraints.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationMessage.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the message type for delegation.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationNotification
member.summary: Represents delegation constraints.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationNotification.Event
member.summary: Gets or sets the event type for delegation.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationCommand
member.summary: Represents delegation constraints.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationCommand.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method for delegation. If not present, The delegation is given for any method in the specified URI.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationCommand.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the resource URI fo delegation.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.DelegationCommand.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the comand status for delegation. If not present, The delegation is given for any status in the specified URI.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group
member.summary: Allows the nodes to manage the groups that they owns or participates.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.Identity
member.summary: Identity of the group, in the group-id@groups.domain.com format.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.Name
member.summary: Name of the group.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.Type
member.summary: Type of the group.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.PhotoUri
member.summary: The group photo URI.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.Creator
member.summary: The group creator identity.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.Created
member.summary: The group creation date.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Group.MembersUri
member.summary: Members uri of the contact group.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupType.Temporary
member.summary: The group exists while the owner session that created it is active. This type of group is useful for mass message sending, since the groups application is optimized to send large amounts of messages. The temporary groups are private.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupType.Private
member.summary: The group is not discoverable and someone can join only if is invited by owner or a moderator.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupType.Public
member.summary: Any authenticated node in the domain can join the group.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMember
member.summary: Represents a member of a group.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMember.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMember.Address
member.summary: The address of the member, in the name@domain/instance format, being the instance information optional.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMember.Role
member.summary: The role of the identity in the group.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMemberRole
member.summary: Enumerates the roles that the members can have in a group.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMemberRole.Member
member.summary: The member can send and receive messages to the group. It's the default value.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMemberRole.Listener
member.summary: The member can only receive messages from the group, and doesn't have permission to send.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMemberRole.Moderator
member.summary: The member can send and receive messages to the group and can kick and ban contacts from it.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.GroupMemberRole.Owner
member.summary: The owner have the permission to manage moderators, change and delete the group.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Ping
member.summary: Allows the nodes to test the network connectivity.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Ping.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence
member.summary: Represents the availability status of a node in a network. A node can only receive envelopes from another nodes in the network if it sets its presence to an available status (except from the server, who always knows if a node is available or node, since this information is enforced by the existing session). In a new session, the node starts with an unavailable status.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.Status
member.summary: The node presence status.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.Message
member.summary: A status message associated to the presence status.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.RoutingRule
member.summary: Rule to the server route envelopes addressed to the identity.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.LastSeen
member.summary: The date of the last known presence status for the node.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.Priority
member.summary: The value of the priority of the presence. This value can affect the way the envelopes are routed to the current session.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.FilterByDistance
member.summary: If true, indicates that the delivery of envelopes for the current session should only occurs if the distance from the originator is the smallest among the resolved routes with this setting. This configuration is not exclusive, so if there's more than one route with the same smallest distance, these sessions should receive the envelopes.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.RoundRobin
member.summary: If true, indicates that the delivery of envelopes for the current session should be distributed by using the round-robin strategy between the resolved routes with this setting.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Presence.Instances
member.summary: Present instances for a identity.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule
member.summary: Defines the envelope routing rules.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.Instance
member.summary: Only deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance).

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.Identity
member.summary: Deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance) and to the identity (name@domain).

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.IdentityByDistance
member.summary: Deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance) and to the identity (name@domain) if the distance from the originator is the smallest among the available nodes of the identity with this setting.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.Promiscuous
member.summary: Deliver any envelopes addressed to the identity name@domain, including the envelopes addressed to any specific instance.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.Domain
member.summary: Deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance) and to the node domain. This rule is intended to be used only by sessions authenticated as .

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.DomainByDistance
member.summary: Deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance) and to the node domain if the distance from the originator is the smallest among the available nodes of the domain with this setting. This rule is intended to be used only by sessions authenticated as .

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.RoutingRule.RootDomain
member.summary: Deliver envelopes addressed to the current session instance (name@domain/instance), to the node domain and all its sub domains. This rule is intended to be used only by sessions authenticated as .

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus
member.summary: Possible presence status values

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus.Unavailable
member.summary: The node is not available for messaging and should not receive any envelope by any node, except by the connected server.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus.Available
member.summary: The node is available for messaging and envelopes can be routed to the node according to the defined routing rule.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus.Busy
member.summary: The node is available but the senders should notice that it is busy and doesn't want to the disturbed or it is on heavy load and don't want to receive any envelope.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus.Away
member.summary: The node is available but the senders should notice that it may not be reading or processing the received envelopes.

member.name: F:Lime.Messaging.Resources.PresenceStatus.Invisible
member.summary: The node is available for messaging but the actual stored presence value is unavailable.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Quota
member.summary: Allows the nodes to manage the session envelope quota configuration.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Quota.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Quota.Threshold
member.summary: The number of envelopes that the node can originate in the current session. If the value is 0 or is not defined, this limit is unbounded. If a session exceeds the limit, it can be finished by the server.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Quota.Throughput
member.summary: Indicates the cap of envelopes per second that the session can send and receive. If the value is 0 or is not defined, this capability is unbounded. If a session exceeds the limit, it can be finished by the server.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Quota.MaxEnvelopeSize
member.summary: The uncompressed size limit of the envelopes that can be sent in the session. If the value is 0 or is not defined, this capability is unbounded. If a envelope sent in the session exceeds the limit, it can be finished by the server.

member.name: T:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Receipt
member.summary: Represents the message events that should generate receipts (notifications) for the node in the current session.

member.name: M:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Receipt.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Lime.Messaging.Resources.Receipt.Events
member.summary: Indicates which message events that the node is receiving in the current session.
